sentences.en: And he got off his stool and went over.
sentences.cn: 他就从凳子上站起身来,走到那头去了.

sentences.en: He heaved himself up off his stool.
He hoisted himself onto a high stool.
sentences.cn: 他抬身坐上了一张高凳子。

sentences.en: He perched himself [ was perched ] on a high stool.
He perched on a stool at the bar.
sentences.cn: 他坐在酒吧间里的一张凳子上.

sentences.en: He perched on a tall stool by the bar.
sentences.cn: 他坐在吧台前的高凳子上.

sentences.en: He straightened up slowly and spun around on the stool to face us.
sentences.cn: 他慢慢直起身子，坐在凳子上转过身来面对着我们。

sentences.en: He wreathed his legs about the stool.
Look out! Don't knock the stool over.
O'Brien sat on a bar stool and leaned his elbows on the counter.
sentences.cn: 奥布赖恩坐在一张吧凳上，胳膊肘靠在吧台上。

sentences.en: She is sitting on a stool.
The little dog jumped over the short stool.
sentences.cn: 小狗跳过了这条小凳子.

sentences.en: The stool comes in several sizes in walnut or mahogany.
sentences.cn: 凳子有几种尺寸，材质分胡桃木和红木两种。

sentences.en: The stool had a torn, red plastic seat.
sentences.cn: 那个凳子的红色塑料座面已经破旧不堪。

trans.tran_cn: 凳子，高脚凳，大便，粪便，根株
trans.tran_en: a seat that has three or four legs, but no back or arms
